name: Power Pop Bubble Shooter 2
description:
Pop, crush and burst all the bubbles in the best bubble shooting game!
Show off your color-matching and strategy skills while you play this cool game anytime and anywhere you’d like. Think you got what it takes to solve all these tricky puzzles and become the bubble pop winner? Hit the road and give it a go!

Looking for fun challenging games to play with families and friends? Can’t get enough of online puzzles and bubble games? Join the ball shooting mania NOW and get ready for a crazy bubbly ride! Warm up your fingers and enjoy the most amazing bubble pop experience- it’s super fun and totally addicting!

FEATURES
- Thousands of amazing puzzle levels to explore.
- The classic and loved bubble shooting gameplay with a modern twist!
- Challenging new elements and objectives. Rescue the hamsters from their bubble traps.
- Super Aim feature that will help you take accurate shots and smash your way up to the top.
- Eye-catching cool design and plenty of new animations and effects.
- Easy to learn and super fun to play bubble pop game.
- Powerful boosters that will help you crush and pop all the colorful balls and win rewards.
- No wifi connection is needed so you can enjoy an unlimited bubble shooting fun!


With thousands of addicting levels packed with awesome puzzles and brain teasers, Power Pop Bubble Shooter 2 provides endless hours of excitement and fun! Download the best ball shooter game for free and sharpen your strategy and matching skills while shooting all the colorful balls.

Don’t wait any longer to join the fun! Play everywhere, anywhere and as much as you want- no internet connection is required. One thing you’ll definitely love about this cool game is that you can play any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited.

CLASSIC BUBBLE FUN
Make sure to aim well so your bubble will land exactly where you want it. Drop the big groups of bubbles first so you can clear a path to victory. See which color you are getting next and work out a strategy to pop and smash all balls using fewer shots. Bubble swap option is totally free- use it wisely! All you have to do is tap on the bubble to change its color.

How to Play:
* Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to smash bubbles.
* Swap and match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop the group and win rewards.
* Solve all the fun puzzles and brain teasers.
* Boost your gaming experience with awesome power-ups that will help you hit and pop balls and clear the board.
* Rescue the hamsters from their bubble traps!
* Plan your moves wisely and pop your way around tricky challenges.
* Reach the level target and complete the different quests.
* Clear a level with fewer moves to get a higher score.


PLAY NOW and see if you can pop all the bubbles and master the challenges. Enjoy thousands of fun puzzle levels and win awesome rewards!

Power Pop Bubble Shooter 2 is free to download and play, but some optional in-game items will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Liked the game? We would love to get your feedback! Let us know what we can add to make your gameplay even more enjoyable and earn your 5-star review.
